page.title: 14NEW GIRL IN WIVELISCOMBE
page.content:
I like coming back to Wiveliscombe. I have lived here before, but I was younger and I don't remember much.
Wiveliscombe is one of the oldest towns I know. The council are changing it a lot. They are building more houses, and they are making the Square very smart and modern. Wivey has a bookshop, and a larger chemist. What I do not like about it is that there are not as many shops as there are in a town. But I would not like to live in a town again as it is too noisy, and you can hardly cross the road because of the traffic. Wivey is so quiet.The rec. has stayed the same since I was last here.I expected there to be some changes, like climbing frames and roundabouts. I like coming back to Wivey, and I like being a new girl.
